info: John Provencher (b. 1991) is an independent artist, designer, educator, and programmer based in New York City. His practice explores the generative potential of software by outputting projects both on/offline.
clients: john works independently, collaborating occasionally with select clients and partners. over his practice, he's worked with the new york times, nike, prada, alexander wang, the atlantic, bloomberg, the new school, the baffler and more.
